snippet.title: TUFU | Quick Solo Lap Around 'Phoenix Steel'
snippet.description:
Here you can see a quick lap around the track 'Phoenix Steel'. Sorry for my long public absense here on this platform. A lot has changed since the last video.

Official small demo release at the end of december this year. 

I will upload more videos this month, showing what has changed. Basicly the whole project is pulled over to Unreal Engine 5, refactored from the ground up. A lot of fixes and adjustments in the physics. Finally I am getting close to the result I want.

Please don't blame the visual quality of the game. I wrote over 200.000 lines of code, I had literally no more time to upgrade the visuals. The main objective this year was to create a functional demo and game, making it run smooth on many system.

Best regards, apfelbaum.

Buy us a coffee: https://ko-fi.com/2unreal4underground

Get more information on our discord server: https://discord.gg/NcXcVWtFyj

Link to Ivans Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2iKJPXiC7vFyBsynfd_XNg
